feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
